channel.title: How do you get rid of nulls?
channel.description:
Hey, ive just started making a server and just got a client Google scape client, i thought that would of got rid of the nulls but it didnt, and when i spawn a item like attack cape and all the capes they are not nulls but when i wear them they go in the weapons area and the capes in the shops are just nulls?
can any1 help?
thanks,
`breeendo~

item.title: How do you get rid of nulls?
item.dc:creator: @red_arrow red arrow
item.description:
@red_arrow wrote:

ok thanks
but then how do i change it in items.class?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get rid of nulls?

item.title: How do you get rid of nulls?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

The capes you use in your shops may be a different id on the client youâ€™re using. To stop the items from going in wrong slot, you can edit them in the Item class.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get rid of nulls?
